HotWaterTank.title: Show Hot water tank information
HotWaterTank.description: Add a Hot water tank accessory, if you you use Daikin heatpump also to warm up domestic water.

OutdoorTemperature.title: Show Outdoor temperature
OutdoorTemperature.description: Add a Temperature accessory, that get the information from your outdoor unit, if your unit supports it.

DisableOnOff.title: Disable on/off switching
DisableOnOff.description: If you don't want to be able to turn your devices on/off by homekit, set this to true.
